Export.Routine:
WWWLIST0 ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Description of Function : ; LISTGENERATORSTART ; FORMATIERUNG DER EINGABEFELDER ;formatting the ; ; Inputs : ; ; ; ByRef : ; ; ; Returns : ; ; ; History : ; 06-Jan-2011 GRF SR17579: Use explicit tag ; 14-Nov-2006 GRF Doco; Dots; quits ; 05.09.1997 DT (C) BY DITMAR TYBUSSEK 1997 ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- quit:$get(YFORM)="" set YLFN="" for set YLFN=$order(^WWW131(0,YFORM,YLFN)) quit:YLFN="" do . set YLF=$get(^WWW131(0,YFORM,YLFN,1)) ;DATEISATZ . set YDATEI=$piece(YLF,Y,1) ;DATEI, DIE GEDRUCKT WIRD . quit:YDATEI="" . set YI="" . for set YI=$order(^WWW002(0,YDATEI,YI)) quit:YI="" do . . set YTYP=$piece($get(^WWW002(0,YDATEI,YI,1)),Y,3) . . set YFELD=$get(YLP(YLFN,$extract(100+YI,2,3))) . . if YFELD'="" set YLP(YLFN,$extract(100+YI,2,3))=$$GetInternal^WWWTR(YTYP,YFELD) . . set YFELD=$get(YLP1(YLFN,$extract(100+YI,2,3))) . . if YFELD'="" set YLP1(YLFN,$extract(100+YI,2,3))=$$GetInternal^WWWTR(YTYP,YFELD) . ; . set YI="" . for set YI=$order(^WWW003(0,YDATEI,YI)) quit:YI="" quit:YI>99 do . . set YTYP=$piece($get(^WWW003(0,YDATEI,YI,1)),Y,3) . . set YFELD=$get(YLD(YLFN,$extract(100+YI,2,3))) . . if YFELD'="" set YLD(YLFN,$extract(100+YI,2,3))=$$GetInternal^WWWTR(YTYP,YFELD) . . set YFELD=$get(YLD1(YLFN,$extract(100+YI,2,3))) . . if YFELD'="" set YLD1(YLFN,$extract(100+YI,2,3))=$$GetInternal^WWWTR(YTYP,YFELD) set YI="" for set YI=$order(^WWW122(0,YFORM,YI)) quit:YI="" do . quit:$piece($get(^WWW122(0,YFORM,YI,1)),Y,1)'="" ;KEIN MANUELLES FELD ;no field . set YTYP=$piece($get(^WWW122(0,YFORM,YI,1)),Y,5) . if $get(YM(YI))'="" set YM(YI)=$$GetInternal^WWWTR(YTYP,YM(YI)) ;+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ; IMPLICIT DROP THROUGH ;+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ START ;STARTEN DES FORMULARS ;launching set KOPF=$$^WWWTEXT(6) do ^WWWSTART(KOPF) set YVOR1=$get(^WWW012(0,YM,1)) ;LAYOUTVORGABEN do:YUSER="" if YUSER'="" if $piece($get(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1)),Y,6)=0 do . if YUSER'="" set $piece(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1),Y,6)=1 . write "" write YCR write "" ;WRITE YCR,YCR,"",YCR,YCR do ^WWWBACK ;ZURÜCK-BUTTON; FIS,13.12.01 set YKOPF=$piece(YVOR,Y,1) if $data(^WWW1201(0,YFORM,SPRACHE,1)) set YKOPF=$piece(^(1),Y,1) write "" write YCR,YKOPF write "
" set YDATEI="" if YFORM'="" set YDATEI=$piece($get(^WWW131(0,YFORM,1,1)),Y,1) if $length($get(YLP(1,"01")))>3 do . if YDATEI'="" if $length(+YLP(1,"01"))=5 if $piece($get(^WWW002(0,YDATEI,1,1)),Y,3)=1 write $$^WWWDATE(+YLP(1,"01")) quit ;DATUM ALS SELEKTION 1 ;Date when . write YLP(1,"01") . write "
" write YCR if $find($piece(YVOR,Y,8),1) write "" if $find($piece(YVOR,Y,8),2) write "" if $find($piece(YVOR,Y,8),3) write "" if $find($piece(YVOR,Y,8),4) write "" ;I $P(YVOR,Y,21)=1 W "
"
	;I $P(YVOR,Y,10)=1 W "
" W YCR,"",YCR
	do ^WWWLIST  ;SELEKTION
	do ^WWWLISTT  ;DRUCKEN ;print 
	;I $P(YVOR,Y,10)=1 W YCR,"
" W "
"
	;I $P(YVOR,Y,21)=1 W "
" if $find($piece(YVOR,Y,8),1) write "" if $find($piece(YVOR,Y,8),2) write "" if $find($piece(YVOR,Y,8),3) write "" if $find($piece(YVOR,Y,8),4) write "" write "" write YCR do ^WWWSTOP quit
